name: Instant Pot® French Onion Dip
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Once you make this, you'll never buy the dip in the little plastic tubs again. Guaranteed! For best results, refrigerate overnight. Serve with potato chips or chopped veggies.
ingredients: 1 medium onion, halved and sliced into petals
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®), and select Saute function
Cook until onions are soft and caramelized, about 8 minutes
Select Manual; set timer for 5 minutes
Allow 5 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, 10 to 40 minutes
Select Saute function again and cook for 5 minutes or until liquid has evaporated
Turn pressure cooker off and allow to cool for 5 minutes
Combine cream cheese, sour cream, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, and garlic powder in a large bowl
Remove onions from pressure cooker using a slotted spoon and add to bowl with cream cheese mixture
Cover dip with plastic wrap and refrigerate for a minimum of 1 hour
